betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Yes, the first sacrifice was to simply leave my life, but that is not the end.
My methods, the things I liked, the way I saw the world. Those will have to go too.
Things are different here, and if I want to ascend, I have to not only aknowledge it, I have to change according to this difference.
The person that does not need this place is a person that is different from the one I am now, who desperately needs this place, and the ascension it promises.
